verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H7200><s%> me, <S%H8147><s%> and behold, two baskets <S%H1736><s%> of figs <S%H8384><s%> set <S%H3259><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim, <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> with the craftsmen <S%H2796><s%> and smiths, <S%H4525><s%> from Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and had brought <S%H935><s%> them to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> basket <S%H1731><s%> had very <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> figs, <S%H8384><s%> like the figs <S%H8384><s%> that are first-ripe; <S%H1073><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> basket <S%H1731><s%> had very <S%H3966><s%> bad <S%H7451><s%> figs, <S%H8384><s%> which could not be eaten, <S%H398><s%> they were so bad. <S%H7455><s%>

Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> What do you see, Jeremiah? <S%H3414><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> Figs; <S%H8384><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> figs, <S%H8384><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> good; <S%H2896><s%> and the bad, <S%H7451><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> bad, <S%H7451><s%> that can't <S%H398><s%> be eaten, they are so bad. <S%H7455><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Like these good <S%H2896><s%> figs, <S%H8384><s%> so will I regard <S%H5234><s%> the captives <S%H1546><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> whom I have sent <S%H7971><s%> out of this place <S%H4725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> for good. <S%H2896><s%>

For I will set <S%H7760><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> on them for good, <S%H2896><s%> and I will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> to this land: <S%H776><s%> and I will build <S%H1129><s%> them, <S%H2040><s%> and not pull them down; and I will plant <S%H5193><s%> them, <S%H5428><s%> and not pluck them up.

I will give <S%H5414><s%> them a heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> that I am Yahweh: and they shall be my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be their God; <S%H430><s%> for they shall return <S%H7725><s%> to me with their whole heart. <S%H3820><s%>

As the bad <S%H7451><s%> figs, <S%H8384><s%> which can't <S%H398><s%> be eaten, they are so bad, <S%H7455><s%> surely thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> So will I give <S%H5414><s%> up Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and his princes, <S%H8269><s%> and the residue <S%H7611><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> who remain <S%H7604><s%> in this land, <S%H776><s%> and those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

I will even give <S%H5414><s%> them up to be tossed <S%H2189><s%> back and forth among all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for evil; <S%H7451><s%> to be a reproach <S%H2781><s%> and a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> a taunt <S%H8148><s%> and a curse, <S%H7045><s%> in all places <S%H4725><s%> where I shall drive them. <S%H5080><s%>

I will send <S%H7971><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> among them, <S%H8552><s%> until they be consumed from off the land <S%H127><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> to them and to their fathers. <S%H1><s%>
